verbs.description: The Trump Administration [V: is] trying to remake the federal courts – one judicial appointment at a time – into hostile forums where justice is nowhere to be found .
[ARG0: The Trump Administration] is [V: trying] [ARG1: to remake the federal courts – one judicial appointment at a time – into hostile forums where justice is nowhere to be found] .
[ARG0: The Trump Administration] is trying to [V: remake] [ARG1: the federal courts – one judicial appointment at a time] – [ARG2: into hostile forums where justice is nowhere to be found] .

The Trump Administration is trying to remake the federal courts – one judicial appointment at a time – into [ARGM-LOC: hostile forums] [R-ARGM-LOC: where] [ARG1: justice] [V: is] [ARG2: nowhere to be found] .
The Trump Administration is trying to remake the federal courts – one judicial appointment at a time – into hostile forums where justice is nowhere to [V: be] found .
The Trump Administration is trying to remake the federal courts – one judicial appointment at a time – into hostile forums where [ARG1: justice] is nowhere to be [V: found] .
